channel.title: Plan on Hugo Techdoc Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Plan on Hugo Techdoc Theme

item.title: Explore Oktas IAM Solution
item.description: Explore Okta’s IAM Solution: From Authentication to Compliance Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - Phase 2: Remove IAM overview content and place it the IAM overview doc. Keep this doc focused on planning on a particular IAM solution. Phase 1: CIAM content needs to be removed. Links to original docs: ‘- Identity and Access Management (IAM) overview: https://developer.

item.title: Understand the reasons for an SSO App
item.description: Understand the reasons for an SSO App Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - All content except for the use case examples from: - Overview of Single Sign-On in the OIN: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-sso-overview/ - Note most of the content is good and not specific to the OIN - Ensure any OIN-specific content is removed. Content type: Explanation

item.title: Understand the benefits of API Services
item.description: Understand the benefits of API Services Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Links to original docs: API service integrations in the OIN: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oin-api-service-overview/ Note that most of this content is not specific to the OIN. Ensure there is not OIN content here Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews. They aim to clarify specific elements of the technology, offering developers practical insights or in-depth clarification on particular points of interest.

item.title: Build with Okta Identity Governance
item.description: Build with Okta Identity Governance Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Why is this here?: All “Other” solutions (which are solutions other than LCM, Automation, and Authentication), 27% of the “Other” solutions customer are building are OIG based. Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews. item.title: Best practices
item.description: Best practices Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: All non-OIN related best practices Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Why is this here?: - In the Oktane AnswerIt game, respondents answered what they would change about dev docs with more examples, best practices, templates Although it was for OIN related topics, respondents also answered they were looking for best practice docs Content type: Dynamic Index

item.title: Build a full solution
item.description: Build a full solution Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: Brief summary and redirect to top build page Content Notes Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Content type: Summary redirect A redirect provides a summary of a topic with links to the articles elsewhere in the site that cover that content in full.Â For example: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oie-upgrade-sign-in-widget-styling/main/ summarizes the options for styling the sign-in widget and links to a more in-depth page for each of them.
